topics.title: Arrays in JavaScript
topics.description: Master arrays, array methods, iteration, and advanced array operations

contents.title: Introduction to Arrays
contents.content:
Arrays are ordered collections of values. They can store multiple values in a single variable.

Key Features:
â€¢ Ordered: Elements have specific positions (index)
â€¢ Zero-indexed: First element is at index 0
â€¢ Dynamic: Can grow or shrink in size
â€¢ Mixed types: Can store different data types
â€¢ Mutable: Can be modified after creation

When to Use Arrays:
â€¢ Store lists of items (users, products, etc.)
â€¢ Maintain ordered data
â€¢ Iterate over collections
â€¢ Implement stacks and queues
â€¢ Store matrix data

Array vs Object:
â€¢ Arrays: Ordered, numeric indices
â€¢ Objects: Unordered, string keys
â€¢ Arrays: Better for lists
â€¢ Objects: Better for structured data

contents.title: Creating and Accessing Arrays

examples.title: Array Methods - Adding/Removing
examples.explanation: These methods modify the original array. push/pop work on end, unshift/shift on beginning, splice anywhere.
